ComicInfo.Characters: Merry Men [Robin Hood [Robin of Locksley,the Sidhe [King Eamonn,James Dunreith],Little John],Wolfshead],Alan-a-Dale,Anne deValere,Rowena (dies),Aelfric (dies),Baron Rupert (dies),Wood Nymphs,Sir Nigel (dies),Friar Tuck,Gryphon [Brian Griffon],Gwyneth Treherne (dies),Hunter (mentioned),Bright Lady (mentioned),Simeon (mentioned),Darklings [Elliane deValere,Black Dragon,Phillip of Antrim (dies),Ranulf deValere (dead, mentioned),Edmund deValere [Runesire of the Western Marches],Morgan Le Fey],Brother William,Will Scarlet,Lady Alais (dies)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:33:57 [Issue ID 4000-25777] urn:comicvine:4000-25777 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:48:07. [Issue ID 40321]
ComicInfo.Summary: The Darklings attack the wedding of Aelfric and Rowena and slaughter those present. Griffon, the sole survivor, discovers that Dunreith is one of the Darklings. Edmund deValere sacrifices Baron Rupert and Lady Alais to the Black Dragon. Gryphon allies with Robin Hood and the Sidhe against Edmund. After the Sidhe temporarily free him of Edmund's control, Dunreith asks Gryphon to kill him. Morgan Le Fey stops him and reveals that she is Dunreith's mother.
